filterOptionsComing: Amahitamo yo gusukura ari hafi kuza!
adjustSearch: Gerageza guhindura ibyo ushakisha cyangwa uko usukura
offlineBanner: Nta internet. Turerekana ibiri muri mudasobwa.
successImageUpload: Ifoto yawe yashyizweho neza kandi yiteguye gusesengurwa.
uploadError: Ntitwashoboye gushyira ifoto yawe. Reba ububiko bwa mudasobwa yawe wongere ugerageze.
permissionRequired: Tanga uburenganzira bwo gukoresha amafoto kugira ngo ushyireho ifoto.
